code: import React,{useState}from"react";import QRScanner from"../components/QRScanner";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConsumerDashboard=()=>{const[scannedData,setScannedData]=useState("");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginTop:0},children:"Consumer Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"muted",children:"Allow camera permission and point to a QR to verify details."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'1fr',gap:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QRScanner,{onScan:data=>setScannedData(data)}),scannedData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{background:'#f1f5f9'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{marginTop:0},children:"Scanned Result"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{style:{whiteSpace:'pre-wrap',margin:0},children:(()=>{try{return JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(scannedData),null,2);}catch(e){return String(scannedData);}})()})]})]})]});};export default ConsumerDashboard;
